data.title: Ladies Who Lunch
data.text:
When my friends & I entered this elegantly decorated tea house, we were greeted by Miss Gloria herself,  and offered a table beautifully set with English bone china teacups. While we were immediately made to feel at home, we also felt as though we'd been transported to England for a traditional "Afternoon Tea".  

We were offered tiny sandwiches, scones, pastries, and of course a wide selection of teas. The atmosphere is cozy, quiet, and perfect for a meal among friends at any time of day.  We hated to leave, but will be returning very soon with more friends who are looking for a warm and unique dining experience.

Miss Gloria does group events like after-church socials and children's theme parties, and will work with anyone who wants to design a special event.  She donates a portion of her profits to "Precious Little Butterflies", a local non-profit organization that supports kids in shelters and foster homes who are victims or witnesses to domestic violence.
